data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 276,824 believers living in the state of Sinaloa. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sinaloa, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Sinaloa, Mexico to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary: On average, 153 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sinaloa, Mexico.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sinaloa to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Sinaloa, Mexico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 2,240,870 people in the state of Sinaloa who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sinaloa, Mexico into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 276,824 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sinaloa, Mexico has a population of 2,641,700.

We estimate Sinaloa has 276,824 people who might know Jesus, 2,240,870 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 124,007 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Sinaloa
location.cities_list: Culiacán, Mazatlán, Los Mochis, Guasave, Guamúchil
